abstract: THL Partners agreed on Friday to sell Michael Foods, a producer and distributor of egg and dairy products, to Goldman Sachs’s private equity arm in a deal valuing the company at $1.7 billion.
snippet: THL Partners agreed on Friday to sell Michael Foods, a producer and distributor of egg and dairy products, to Goldman Sachs’s private equity arm in a deal valuing the company at $1.7 billion.
lead_paragraph: THL Partners agreed on Friday to sell Michael Foods, a producer and distributor of egg and dairy products, to the Goldman Sachs‘s private equity arm, GS Capital Partners, in a deal valuing the company at $1.7 billion.

headline.main: THL to Sell Michael Foods to GS Capital Partners
